title: Honey, I’m Going On a Strike
summary: As high society's most eligible lady, Sierra Fernein did whatever it took to please her family, despite their flagrant disregard for her. But upon discovering she has only a month left to live, she decides to go on strike from being a prim and proper lady and live life on her own terms. Shedding the Fernein name, she declares war on anyone who dares get in her way, including her family and a few pesky admirers. But with just 30 days left, can Sierra finally enjoy the life of her dreams?

title: The Fake Lady and the Knight
summary: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.

title: True Love of Mr. Wonderful
summary: Gong Jiu, a valkyrie of the apocalyptic era, transmigrated into the body of the white rose of the entertainment industry who was hated by many. On the day she arrived in the world, she unexpectedly saved the life of the cold King of the SIlver Screen, Bo Yibai! The cool and strong Alpha, straight actress X The cold, arrogant yet quiet Adonis of the masses. The two of them co-starred in a drama and went onto variety shows together as the arrival of Gong Jiu brought about a wave of interesting events in the boring entertainment industry! After Gong Jiu and Bo Yibai’s relationship was made public, the audience would always scream, “Help! The wife of the King of the SIlver Screen is ruining the variety show!”

title: Let Me Enjoy the Extra Life
Potion Witch
summary:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://crossinfworld.com/Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)

title: I’ll Marry Your Brother
summary: A beautiful and successful news anchor, Yeojin's life looks perfect from the outside. But in reality, she's trapped in an unhappy marriage. Not only did her husband have an affair with her close coworker, but he also murdered her parents and stole their company. Yeojin thought her life was over, but when she opened her eyes, she found herself back on her wedding day. Watching her husband and his mistress flirt, Yeojin swears to get her revenge. She will do whatever it takes, even if she must marry her husband's older brother.

title: From Goblin to Goblin God
summary: Lin Tian reincarnated as a goblin, the lowest rank of magical creatures, and initially, he had to lie low. Later, he fully unleashed the true nature of a goblin. Blessed with many offspring, the more children he has, the stronger he becomes thanks to the blessings from the gods!

title: Who Kidnapped the Empress?
summary:
"All my people are dead... I just wanted to try my best. I just wanted to be a kind Empress. Why..."

Her injuries made her look so worn out… After torturing her for days and killing everyone she ever loved, the Emperor abandoned the Empress in the snowy mountains. In this heavy snowfall, the former Empress Roselyn had resigned herself and was ready to accept death. Her family, her friends, all her hard work for the people of the empire... There was no reason left for her to continue living. So she laid down on this pure white blanket, her body almost frozen, and watched the white snow be dyed in black. At first, the cold was painful, but the pain quickly subsided and so she thought that freezing to death just might not be all that bad.

“Being persecuted to death, lying alone as if you're ruling this snowy field...”

That man.

“If you don't need your life anymore... then pardon me, I’ll take it.”

He's the enemy general, Tamon Krasis.

“You’re mine now, Empress.”

She was abandoned by them, but he stole her and took her away. Who kidnapped the Empress?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/who-stole-the-empress?)

title: Exclusive maid of the evil empress
summary:
I, Paresa Menzel, a money-grubbing handmaiden to the infamous Empress. I thought she was the ultimate villainess, but she's nothing more than a prickly cat?! But then I realized that there was a lot more to her than meets the eyes, so I wanted to help her.
"If you are a spy disguised as a maid, I have no choice but to dispose of you."
But I never expected to be noticed by the crown prince. It's bad enough that my heart flutters every time I see the face of the most beautiful one in the empire...! I know I seem suspicious, but my loyalty to the Empress is genuine!

title: Wake up, Jeon Seung Yeon
summary:
Seung-yeon is popular because of her pretty face, tall stature, and unique aura, and she works at a cafe, where she gets cheap self-esteem from male customers who show her favor.

Now in her senior year, Seung-yeon knows she should focus on her studies, but she can't quit her job at the cafe easily...
She meets the charming Lee Beom...
___
### Links
* [Alternative Raw](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11589552)

title: Blade of Retribution
summary: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.

title: The Ordinary Lawyer’s Subspace
summary:
A strange door appears in front of lawyer Han Beom-sang.

Beyond it lies a space where time stands still.

title: God-level Assassin, I’m the Shadow
summary:
In a world where people sleep and enter the realm abandoned by God, Qin Feng, who had sacrificed everything for his sister, is betrayed by her.
However, fate grants him a second chance, sending him back nine years before the abandoned world appears.
This time, Qin Feng chooses to abandon his sister and focus on becoming the strongest.

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: I Healed The Male Lead’s Trauma
summary:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

title: Making Love in a World Where It’s Taboo
summary:
"You want to make a baby with me, right?" Having never made love before, The Prince and his wife are in for a steamy night. Once they get a taste, they'll never be able to go back.

(Source: Coolmic)

title: Divorce Is Easy, But Love Is Hard
summary:
Ji Sina, a senior attorney at K Law Firm, is full of ambition. In order to proudly inherit her father's law firm in the future, she went through a difficult road and finally sat down as a partner lawyer, but she was then told that a guy like a horse snatched the position, the same one which had witnessed her dark history from her 20's, Sina, who is nice and kind to everyone, only has one man she can never get close to, and the person in all of these positions is Ryu Kang Hyun. Seduce such a person and say that you will inherit the law firm only if you succeed in marriage?

"I have a lot of divorce experience, but I don't know much about dating!"

The romance between Sina, an ambitious woman who doesn't know where to go, and Kang-hyun, a senior who doesn't know what's going on, begins.

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6312288)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9608891), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=808201)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/lihunrongyilianainan/list?title_no=2438)

title: The oppressed magic tool maker elopes with a mod butler
summary:
I never expected the dull servant to actually be a prince...!

Erin, a young girl who devotes herself to developing magical tools to fulfill her late mother’s dream of "making people happy with magic tools."

However, as the child of a mistress, Erin is in a difficult position and endures relentless harassment from her stepmother.

Despite her struggles to achieve her dream, Erin's hopes are crushed by her stepmother's schemes, and she is pushed to the depths of despair.

In her darkest moment, the only ally she has, the servant Foolda, reaches out to her.

"Would you elope with me?"

title: The Empress’s Beast Selection
summary:
A collection of older oneshots that are also collected in other collections.

Volume 1:
1. "Sunde ni Touch!" in "Imadoki" Vol. 5
2. "Couple" in "Shishunki Miman Okotowari Kanketsu Hen"
3. "Hatsuki Triangle" in "Suna no Tiara"
4. "Houkago Gensou" in "Appare Jipangu" Vol. 1
5. "700 Nichi no Blue" in "Suna no Tiara"

Volume 2:

6. "Perfect Lovers" in "Musubiya Nanako"
7. "Otomoe no jijou" in "Shishuki Miman Okotowari" Vol. 3
8. "Genseika" in "Mint de Kiss me"
9. "Mint de Kiss Me" in "Mint de Kiss Me"
10. "Pajama de Ojama" in "Gomen Asobase!"
11. "Pajama de Meiro" in "Gomen Asobase!"

title: Reincarnated As the Villain Queen to Get My Revenge
CTRL X
summary:
My ex-boyfriend of ten years, Daniel,
 married my best friend, Olivia, on
 Christmas, which is also my birthday! To
 add to the drama, world-renowned singer-
 songwriter Chris made a surprise
 appearance at their wedding, transforming
 it into a concert venue as a form of sweet
 revenge. However, the following morning,
 Chris receives some shocking news. Will
 she be able to reclaim her lost love.
 friendship, and fame?

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: Reincarnated Escort Warrior
summary: Although an old porter has shown great determination and loyalty to his escort agency, he is never given the chance to become an armed escort due to his bad leg. But after sacrificing his life to keep a priceless treasure from a group of bandits, he is reborn as the 22-year-old Li Zhenglong who died 30 years ago! Now, in the body of the fourth young master of the Heavenly Dragon Escort Agency, will he finally realize his dream? Or will Li Zhenglong's terrible reputation ruin it all?

title: Try Begging Me
summary: Lloyd, the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby, has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country's joke. Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It's become too much of a despairing environment that he's come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather. The mage, who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easygoing life!

title: I Tried to be a Villainess, But Now I’m Being Obsessed Over?!
End of the Show Window
summary: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...

title: The Lord of the Wheel of Destiny
summary:
A collection of short stories:  
  
1. Oral Cavity Infectious Syndrome  
On the surreal premise that women's mouths take the often weird shape of their partner's penis, Yoriko starts an investigation to discover with whom her boyfriend is cheating.  
  
2. Local Tourist Information  
A guide to an extraterritorial region of Japan.  
  
3. Back Streets in Front of the Station  
A girl goes crazy about reverse sides of different things, including streets, cars, and animals.  
  
4. Genesis  
Kago Shintarou's rendition of the Book of Genesis.  
  
5. Superglue  
What happens when you step on something so disgusting that you never want to uncover it?  
  
6. Akutagawa in Front of the Station  
A surreal homage to the writings of Ryunosuke Akutagawa.  
  
7. When All's Said and Done - also included in Hell Season  
A gruesome tale of hardened faeces, and a limbless girl.  
  
8. Multiplication  
Comic panels are multiplying and create opposing clans.  
  
9. Abstraction  
A two dimensional comic about young lovers turns 3D causing the characters' bodies to deform.  
  
10. Blow-Up  
What happens when every comic page features exponentionally more panels than the previous one?  
  
11. No Need for Caution  
The action of the comic happens outside of the panels–literally–in the white space.  
  
12. The Memories of Others  
Everyone's memories become visible via floating comic book panels.  
  
13. Lord of the Ring  
An incompetent sumo wrestler uses the powers of a forbidden pair of pants to overcome and shame his competition, until one day someone rises to attempt to crush him and take the pants for himself.  
  
14. Spinning Thoughts  
Wearing urinary calculi is the latest fashion trend.

title: I’m Actually a Cultivation Bigshot
summary: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: The Duke’s Villainous Daughter Is Depressed
summary:
After passing out drunk on a cold night, I awake as a nameless young orphan girl. But she's not just any girl, she's a character from a novel I wrote in high school! Abused and sold at auction as a slave, I'm suddenly rescued by my father, Duke Henry Wensgrey, the story's original villain. Far from the wicked character I created, he's now a total fool for his daughter. But our relationship isn't the only thing that's changed, and I soon discover that this world isn't anything like what I wrote!

---
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%8B%B9-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EC%8B%A4%EC%84%B8-%EB%A7%89%EB%82%B4%EB%94%B8%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3441), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60083487)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26382&contentId=382&platform=IA)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/131595)

title: The Caring Young Lady Wants to Be a Wall
summary:
Irina de Claudel was reincarnated as a background character in her favorite BL game. While she’s busy playing matchmaker to get her favorite pairing, Henri and Noel, together… She somehow ends up being loved by both of them!?
“All I ever wanted… was to be a wall between them…!”
Will Irina succeed in getting the two together in the end!? A chaotic love comedy where the heroine is adored by the very romanceable characters of a BL game!

title: The akashic record which only i can read
summary:
"I, who know all the world's secrets, will change this doomed future!"

In a world where dungeons exist, Yuya Shirasaki, an awakened warrior, risks his life to conquer them, aiming to earn enough for his ailing sister's medical treatments. Yet, despite his efforts, his sister dies, and Yuya himself falls to the mightiest of monsters—or so it seems. In the instant before his death, Yuya awakens the forbidden skill, Akashic Record, allowing him not only to gain all knowledge but also to return ten years into the past.

With a second chance at life and armed with the wisdom of both past and future, Yuya sets out to rise at an unstoppable pace in this monster-filled world. "If it's to save my sister—and this world—then I’ll become the strongest there is!"

title: You Didn’t Say the Start of the Regression Was a Gate
summary:
Han Seo-ha is a warrior who fought to the end against the evil empress who ruled the world. She died in a final battle, but woke up in the past, the day she entered a portal called “Gate Dragon”. This portal was actually a virtual reality game that took people to a fantasy world full of monsters and dangers.

 She decided to use her knowledge of the future to survive and change the fate of the world but, she will have to face many obstacles and enemies who tried to stop her, Seo-ha will also find several allies and friends who helped her on her journey.

title: It’s a thing, it’s a thing
summary: I, Honjou Kaede, was invited by my friend, Shiromine Risa, to play a VRMMO. I don't hate games, but painful things are a little… no, I hate it very, very much. Eh!… the pain would be reduced if I placed stats on defense power? Then, the only place where I can place it, is there right? Right? Solidly fortify everything into defense, now here I come!

title: Embodiment of the Assassin in the Murim World
summary:
The No.1 Hitman, Kim Gun, finds himself plunged into the world of martial arts due to a mysterious accident. To return to his original world, he must complete a mission called 'Martial Arts Conquest.'

With a total of 2 guns, Kim Gun's adventure to subdue the unfamiliar martial arts world begins.

title: I Became the Husband of the Cult Leader of the Demonic Sect
summary:
One of the Six Divine Clans of the Heavenly Demon Sect, the great heir of the Majin Jin Clan, Jin Yeomyeong.
Grateful for being born with a golden spoon in my mouth, I just wanted to enjoy a sweet life...
But damn that Murim Alliance — they destroyed the Heavenly Demon Sect.

And in the final moments of my life, the cult leader Cheon Yura says to me:
“Would you seduce me?”

title: Clever Cleaning Life Of The Returned Genius Hunter
summary:
World’s first SSS-ranked genius hunter, Kim Jun-woo.

He regresses ten years into the past after being ambushed by unknowns one day. With all his hunter skills now locked, he must fulfill his career as a dungeon cleaner to unlock them.

But this cleaner… is extraordinary!

The once renowned hunter, Kim Jun-woo, takes over the cleaning duty with vigorous determination.

title: Lady of Iron Wall
summary:
Alpheus, the Marquis of Lothian and master of Silverglen Castle, is considered the perfect man with a brilliant mind and a handsome face. However, rumour has it that he suffers from a mysterious disease and always wears gloves.

His finance secretary Edith has been working for the marquis for years when he suddenly asks her to act as his fake fiancée. He seems to need an excuse to refuse the many marriage proposals offered to him, but what exactly is his plan that he strangely acts incredibly sincere in this contract relationship? The longer she pretends to be his fiancée, the more confused Edith becomes...

A cold-blooded noble and a lady with a defence as strong as an iron wall - the beginning of a workplace romance that starts with a contract!

title: Frozen Apocalypse: No Chance of Survival
summary: The stars shift, the blizzard persists, the icy apocalypse is imminent, food! Temperature! Violence! Dependence! In this dilemma, under the distortion of human nature, has desire given birth to monsters? How to break out of adversity and find a way to survive!

title: I Don’t Want to Be Loved
summary: Humans that wear clothing with ancient elements, knights that use elemental magic, cultivators that soar through the sky on their swords, a loli squad who fights using nanomachines, undeads who came from a door to another world, Super Saiyans… These all aren't important, what's important is: "Do you want to become rich"? Top of the realms! Strongest in the universe! Earning the name of the richest man alive in Forbes! Taking you on journeys around the realms! Teach you how to be the richest! Teaching you how to achieve financial freedom! Earn an astronomically large sum of money!!

title: Remember Me
summary:
Magic school is a lot harder when you're trying not to die!

Life seemed perfect for Oriana after she started dating Vincent in the winter of her fifth year at the academy. Little did she know, her beloved would soon die under suspicious circumstances. Before she can process anything, she wakes up to find herself back in her seven-year-old body with no idea how she died. When she finally returns to the magic academy in hopes of reuniting with her boyfriend, she finds out Vincent has no memory of her! Now she's back at square one. Can Oriana navigate this second chance at life and change the course of Vincent's fate? Making her crush work out really is a matter of life and death!

title: Our Guild’s Idol
summary: "Ah-jin," who was enjoying the game using her younger brother's account, approached the female user [Flower Princess] for the sake of the guild, but ended up being identified as a lurking female. "Actually, I'm a woman...!" Meanwhile, 'Ji-hyeon,' who is secretly active as [Flower Princess], feels that the voice in the video sent by Ah-jin sounds familiar...

title: I Underestimated My Oshi’s Attachment
summary:
Estefania worked herself to the bone for her family’s sake, while they took her for granted. One day, Estefania realized that, reincarnated in the world of her favorite novel, she was a supporting character who didn’t have much time left to live. She closed the book on her days of living in her family’s shadow, and set out to meet her oshi, the Grand Mage Synil Crown. However, as Synil is cold-hearted and ruthless, she had thought to be satisfied with just seeing him once, but before she knew it, she became the target of his attachment―!?
“S- Synil-sama, isn’t this a bit too close…?”
“In what way?”

Note: An “oshi” is a favorite member in an idol group or a favorite character from a story, movie, game, etc.

title: Youth Lovesome
summary:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!

title: A Prince’s Proposal to the Saintess Who Failed him
